invite.EXEC: this.say('Would you like to play Who Wants To Be A Millionaire?')
invite.affirm: this.say('Awesome! Then let us begin.'); this.change_state('ask_question')
invite.reject: this.say('Too bad. Maybe next time then.'); this.change_state('goodbye')
invite.DEFAULT: this.say("I'm sorry. I don't quite understand your answer. Was that a yes?")

ask_question.DEFAULT: this.say('Let me process what you just said.')

seek_confirmation.affirm: this.say('Let us check the answer then.'); this.change_state('lock_answer')
seek_confirmation.reject: this.say("I'll give you more time"); this.change_state('repeat_question')
seek_confirmation.DEFAULT: this.say('Let me process what you just said.')
